alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:55AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Benton and east central Delaware Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 355 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of South West City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... Highfill... Springtown... Maysville... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Hiwasse... Miller... Centerton... Fairmount... Vaughn... Cherokee City... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 84 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
